page.title: 12Local News
page.content: There are two local newspapers. The Star is free and is published on a Friday. The Visiter is published twice weekly, Wednesday's edition being delivered free to each house, and Friday's costing 18p.Here is a summary of local news on June 5th 1985. There was plenty of bad news, such as a disabled girl dying in a house fire, and a jogger being hit by a car while running on the beach.There is less good news but one example was a local Travel Agent going to Oslo. There are also reports on weddings and funerals. There was political news and several descriptions of money-raising events.Additionally, there are reports of local clubs and societies, as well as letters from local residents.
